name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition
description:
Rocksmith 2014 Edition is an arcade game developed by Ubisoft San Francisco. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Rocksmith 2014 Edition on PC, macOS, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
It was produced by Nao Higo. It was directed by Paul Cross.
